com.twitter.heron.packing

Class AssertPacking

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.packing.AssertPacking

  • public final class AssertPacking
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for common test assertions related to packing

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void assertContainerRam(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans, ByteAmount maxRamforResources)
      Verifies that the RAM allocated for every container in a packing plan is less than a given maximum value.
      static void assertContainers(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans, java.lang.String boltName, java.lang.String spoutName, ByteAmount expectedBoltRam, ByteAmount expectedSpoutRam, ByteAmount notExpectedContainerRam)
      Verifies that the containerPlan has at least one bolt named boltName with ram equal to expectedBoltRam and likewise for spouts.
      static void assertNumInstances(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans, java.lang.String component, int numInstances)
      Verifies that the containerPlan contains a specific number of instances for the given component.
      static void assertPackingPlan(java.lang.String expectedTopologyName, Pair<java.lang.Integer,InstanceId>[] expectedComponentInstances, PackingPlan plan) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • assertContainers

        public static void assertContainers(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans,
                                    java.lang.String boltName,
                                    java.lang.String spoutName,
                                    ByteAmount expectedBoltRam,
                                    ByteAmount expectedSpoutRam,
                                    ByteAmount notExpectedContainerRam)
        Verifies that the containerPlan has at least one bolt named boltName with ram equal to expectedBoltRam and likewise for spouts. If notExpectedContainerRam is not null, verifies that the container ram is not that.

      • assertNumInstances

        public static void assertNumInstances(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans,
                                      java.lang.String component,
                                      int numInstances)
        Verifies that the containerPlan contains a specific number of instances for the given component.

      • assertContainerRam

        public static void assertContainerRam(java.util.Set<PackingPlan.ContainerPlan> containerPlans,
                                      ByteAmount maxRamforResources)
        Verifies that the RAM allocated for every container in a packing plan is less than a given maximum value.

                                     Pair<java.lang.Integer,InstanceId>[] expectedComponentInstances,
                                     PackingPlan plan)
